title: "Leadership and Acceleration Heatmap"
format: html

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
codes <- read_csv("data/raw/p1_heatmap_input.csv")
```


```{r create codes columns}
codes <- codes |> 
    rename(leadership_model = Leadership_Model,
            objective = Objective, 
            equity_frame = Equity_Frame,
            risk_cues = Risk_Cues,
            placement_domain = Placement_Domain, 
            implications_for_accel = Implications_for_Acceleration)
#Multi-coding in single cell
codes_long <- codes |> 
    separate_rows(c(leadership_model,
                    objective,
                    equity_frame,
                    risk_cues,
                    placement_domain,
                    implications_for_accel),
                  sep = ",")

```
